column5: So it's Superbolw Sunday and we have decided we need to make some wings.  So I'm asking you for some of you go to chicken wing recipes.  Me, I like them baked with Bull' s Eye BBQ sauce mixed with some Frank's Red Hot.

I like to marinade mine in lemon and lime juice(fresh squeezed) Dont forget to grate the outter skin of the lemon.Another trick to get the flavor  right in there,slice the wings.  Then throw them on the bbq and baste with a spicey homemade sauce.
I just call the local pizza and wing joint!

i deep fry the wings, make a sauce from franks red hot, butter, and a little bbq sauce, and bake the wings for 5 minutes  to let the sauce soak a bit.  mmmmm... just made some the other night.  for super bowl sunday i'm making a whole chicken.
